configuration.title: Draw
configuration.stem: Make a diagram to explain how a plantâ€™s root system and shoot system work together to provide the plant with food, water, and soil nutrients.
configuration.teacherAnswer:
Student diagrams should show that the root system takes in
water and nutrients from the soil. These materials enter the
shoot system, which delivers them to all parts of the plant.
